context.p: You can preview the billing data for a customer's subscriptions for a specified time frame. The billing data can be saved to an XML file or opened in an editor of your choice. You can edit the billing data and work with it as required, for example when forwarding the data to an accounting system.

The billing data preview collects the billing-relevant data for the specified customer and accumulates it for every day within the specified time frame. The data is not stored in the database; the result is just a cost projection for the customer organization.

step.cmd: From the Organization ID list, select the organization for which you want to view the billing data.

info.p: The list contains all organizations managed on your platform.

step.cmd: Specify the start and end date of the time frame for which you want to view the billing data.

info.p: The system calculates the exact costs for this time frame, independent of the defined billing periods. If the two dates correspond to the first day and the last day of a billing period, the costs calculated for the preview are exactly the same as calculated by the billing run for the billing period.
The dates need to be specified in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

step.cmd: Choose whether to save the data to a file (<date>BillingData.xml) or to view it instantly in an editor of your choice.
